203749004.qualifier:
Park, Stay & Fly - 4 Days Parking - Rate includes 4 days of car parking.
Must book this rate category to receive benefit. Upon arrival at hotel, guests must register and leave car key at the Park & Fly Desk. Car may be moved to a car park offsite. Additional days of parking will be charged and must be paid to the car park on return. No refunds for any unused portion of offer. Offer is not valid with groups/conventions and may not be combined with other promotional offers. Other restrictions may apply.

description:
Luxury hotel with spa at Heathrow Airport Terminal 5

Fly in, chill out
Futuristic and luxurious, Sofitel London Heathrow is the perfect place to pamper yourself after a long flight. The hotel is directly connected to Terminal 5 via a walkway, and you can take the scheduled shuttle bus (surcharge) to other terminals. Central London is a 20-minute train ride.

Family fun
If youre traveling with little ones, why not try the thrilling rides of Thorpe Park or the colorful models of Legoland, both within a 20-minute drive? Or you could visit medieval Windsor Castle, one of the Queen's residences.

Revitalize and rejuvenate
After a workout in the 24-hour fitness center, you can choose from a variety of treatments in the spa, including a vitality pool and an aromatherapy steam room (subject to charges). If thats not enough, youll definitely relax after a flute of champagne at Perrier-Jouet Bar.

Peace and perks
Guestrooms indulge with premium bedding, including Egyptian cotton sheets and pillowtop mattresses. The little perks count too, such as free WiFi and soundproof windows.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Luxury hotel with spa at Heathrow Airport Terminal 5

Fly in, chill out
Futuristic and luxurious, Sofitel London Heathrow is the perfect place to pamper yourself after a long flight. The hotel is directly connected to Terminal 5 via a walkway, and you can take the scheduled shuttle bus (surcharge) to other terminals. Central London is a 20-minute train ride.

Family fun
If youre traveling with little ones, why not try the thrilling rides of Thorpe Park or the colorful models of Legoland, both within a 20-minute drive? Or you could visit medieval Windsor Castle, one of the Queen's residences.

Revitalize and rejuvenate
After a workout in the 24-hour fitness center, you can choose from a variety of treatments in the spa, including a vitality pool and an aromatherapy steam room (subject to charges). If thats not enough, youll definitely relax after a flute of champagne at Perrier-Jouet Bar.

Peace and perks
Guestrooms indulge with premium bedding, including Egyptian cotton sheets and pillowtop mattresses. The little perks count too, such as free WiFi and soundproof windows.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value: Hotel Sofitel London Heathrow is attached to the London Heathrow Airport via a covered walkway. Central London is a 20-minute train ride away and several attractions are within 5 miles (8 kilometers). This Sofitel hotel offers extensive and modern event facilities including meeting/conference rooms, 3 boardrooms, and a lecture theater. A staffed business center provides secretarial services, cell phones for hire, faxing/copying/printing services, and wireless Internet access.  The onsite full-service spa (at additional charge) features 5 treatment rooms, a hammam, and steam and sauna rooms (guests 16 years and older only). A 24-hour fitness center is located next to the spa. The London Heathrow hotel has 5 dining venues including 2 restaurants, 2 bar/lounges, and a tea salon. The hotel also provides 24-hour room service. Additional services and amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, a concierge desk, secured covered parking (surcharge), dry cleaning, safe deposit box at the front desk, luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a currency exchange. A gift shop is also on site.

DINING.value:
La Belle poque - Serves classic French cuisine. Open for breakfast and lunch with dinner served only on Saturdays. Closed Sundays.

Tea 5 - Serving traditional English tea, coffees, and pastries, desserts and light meals. Open daily from morning till evening.

Vivre - Casual dining restaurant with open kitchen offering a variety of cooking styles. Live cooking in the evening. Open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Breakfast served till 11 AM on weekends and Bank holidays.

Sphere - Chic bar and lounge with an artistic fireplace and Icelandic dcor. Serving snacks, artesian beverages, tap beers, cocktails, and a variety of wines. Open early evening to late night.

Perrier Jouet Bar - Serving a variety of drinks including vintage wines and champagnes. Snack bar available. Open mid-day to late night (hours subject to change)

24-hours room service available

RECREATION.value:
A 24-hour fitness center is located next to the ESPA spa.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

HCOM_SPA.value: The full-service ESPA spa offers 5 treatment rooms, a relaxation room, a hammam, and a Massage Hydro Suite. The spa also includes a steam room, sauna, and vitality pool (Guests ages 16 plus only).

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Near airport
Connected via a covered walkway to Terminal 5, this London Heathrow Airport hotel is a 20-minute train ride to Central London. Windsor Castle, Uxbridge, Legoland, Stockley Park, and Thorpe Park are nearby.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • Up to 2 children 11 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Breakfast fee: GBP 19.95 per person (approximately)
  • Fee for in-room wireless Internet: GBP 15.00 per 24-hour period (rates may vary)
  • Fee for in-room high-speed Internet (wired): GBP 15.00 per stay (rates may vary)
  • Airport shuttle fee: GBP 4.50 per person (one way)
  • Self parking fee: GBP 16.00 per night
  • Early check-in fee: GBP 10.00
  • Late check-out fee: GBP 10.00
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 20.00 per stay
  • A facilities fee includes use of:

    • - Spa

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

GOLD.value: Londons luxurious Sofitel Heathrow offers you a comfortable, convenient place to rest and dine with a direct connection to the airport's Terminal 5. You can reach other terminals via a scheduled, inter-terminal shuttle (surcharge). Unwind with a massage or aromatherapy treatment at the hotels extensive spa before heading into central London, just 20 minutes on the Heathrow Express.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Perfect location for a layover at Heathrow - directly connected to Terminal 5 and a short shuttle ride from other terminals

  • Clean, modern rooms with soundproof windows

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day
Our guests love the convenience of Sofitel London Heathrow, whose luxurious, soundproof guestrooms are located right off Terminal 5. While 5-star facilities don't come cheap, for travelers facing a layover it's worth the splurge.

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Sofitel London Heathrow is just 3.4 mi (5.5 km) from the airport and offers a shuttle at scheduled times for GBP 4.50 per person one way. You can grab a bite to eat at one of the 2 restaurants and visit the spa to be pampered with massages, detox wraps, or aromatherapy. 2 bars/lounges and an indoor pool are other highlights at this luxurious hotel, and rooms offer up nice touches like iPod docks, bathrobes, and pillowtop beds with Egyptian cotton sheets.
